text: Frederick A. "Fred" DeLuca (October 3, 1947 - September 14, 2015) was an American billionaire businessman. He best known as the co-founder and CEO of the Subway franchise of sandwich shops. DeLuca was born in Brooklyn, New York to Italian American parents. He was married to Elisabeth from 1965 until his death. They had a son, Jonathan. DeLuca died from leukemia on September 14, 2015 in Lauderdale Lakes, Florida. He was 67. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American billionaires Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Cancer deaths in Florida Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:People from Brooklyn
title: Fred DeLuca
